people_also_ask.question: Is Super Mario Kart free?
people_also_ask.heading: Note: A Nintendo Account is required to play Mario Kart Tour. * Free-to-start; optional in-game purchases available. Persistent Internet, compatible smartphone, and Nintendo Account required. Data charges may apply.
people_also_ask.title: ‎Mario Kart Tour on the App Store

people_also_ask.question: Can I play Mario Kart on my phone?
people_also_ask.heading: Mario Kart Tour, Nintendo's latest mobile game, is now available on iOS for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, as well as on Android devices. The game, like Nintendo's other mobile releases, is free to play, with in-app purchases (in-game currency called “rubies”) that you use for upgrades and unlocks.25-Sep-2019

knowledge_panel.description: mario kart is a series of go-kart racing video games developed and published by nintendo, as a spin-off from its flagship super mario series. its characters and race courses originally included those from the mario series only. wikipedia
